column4: Hello!  What's the easiest way to mount an ext4fs disk on Ubuntu 8.10?  Is there a kernel module I can install to add support?
did you try searching apt for "ext4fs"?
The only package that mentioned it is e2fsprogs, and I have it installed.
k. I don't know much along those lines either, just thought I'd ask 'cause that would be my first step.
